snippet: On March 7, 1965, state troopers and a sheriff's posse in Selma, Ala., attacked 525 civil rights demonstrators taking part in a march between Selma and Montgomery, the state capital.
abstract: On March 7, 1965, state troopers and a sheriff's posse in Selma, Ala., attacked 525 civil rights demonstrators taking part in a march between Selma and Montgomery, the state capital.

headline.main: March 7, 1965 | Civil Rights Marchers Attacked in Selma
